zh-cn: 薄熙来受贿、贪污、滥用职权案

description.zh-cn: 指从2012年上半年开始，原中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记薄熙来因王立军事件被免职调查，其本人、妻子谷开来及亲信王立军等先后被判刑的一系列事件。
description.en: Refers to a series of events starting in the first half of 2012, where Bo Xilai, former member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Chongqing Party Secretary, was dismissed and investigated following the Wang Lijun incident, leading to the sentencing of himself, his wife Gu Kailai, and his confidant Wang Lijun.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中共元老薄一波之子，曾任中共中央政治局委员、重庆市委书记。因严重违纪违法问题被查处，最终被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: A Chinese politician, son of CPC elder Bo Yibo, who served as a member of the Politburo and Party Secretary of Chongqing. He was investigated for serious violations of discipline and law and was eventually sentenced to life imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 2012年2月，时任重庆市副市长王立军进入美国驻成都总领事馆滞留，引发了严重的政治事件，并直接导致了薄熙来案的爆发。
description.en: In February 2012, Wang Lijun, then Vice Mayor of Chongqing, entered and stayed at the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu, triggering a serious political incident that directly led to the Bo Xilai case.

description.zh-cn: 英国商人尼尔·海伍德在中国重庆死亡的案件。经复查，薄熙来的妻子谷开来被认定为凶手，此案是薄熙来案的重要背景之一。
description.en: The case of the death of British businessman Neil Heywood in Chongqing, China. Upon review, Bo Xilai's wife, Gu Kailai, was identified as the murderer. This case is one of the important backgrounds to the Bo Xilai case.

description.zh-cn: 中国律师，薄熙来之妻。因故意杀人罪（海伍德死亡案）被判处死刑，缓期二年执行。
description.en: A Chinese lawyer and the wife of Bo Xilai. She was sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve for intentional homicide in the Neil Heywood death case.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任重庆市副市长、公安局局长，是薄熙来的亲信。其进入美国驻成都总领事馆的事件是薄熙来案的导火索。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Vice Mayor and Public Security Bureau Chief of Chongqing, and was a confidant of Bo Xilai. His entry into the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu triggered the Bo Xilai case.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的前高级领导人，中共八大元老之一，薄熙来之父。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, one of the Eight Elders of the CPC, and the father of Bo Xilai.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。在薄熙来事件中，中共中央作出了免去其职务、立案调查等一系列决定。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China. In the Bo Xilai incident, the CPC Central Committee made a series of decisions including his removal from office and the initiation of an investigation.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会
en: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党最高纪律检查机关，负责对薄熙来严重违纪问题进行立案调查。
description.en: The highest disciplinary inspection body of the Communist Party of China, responsible for investigating Bo Xilai for serious violations of discipline.

description.zh-cn: 对薄熙来案提起公诉的检察机关。
description.en: The procuratorial organ that prosecuted the Bo Xilai case.

description.zh-cn: 负责审理薄熙来案并作出一审判决的法院。
description.en: The court that tried the Bo Xilai case and delivered the first-instance verdict.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，薄熙来事件发生时任中共中央政治局常委、国务院总理。他曾公开批评重庆市委，要求其反思王立军事件。
description.en: A Chinese politician who was a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo and Premier of the State Council when the Bo Xilai incident occurred. He publicly criticized the Chongqing Municipal Party Committee, demanding it reflect on the Wang Lijun incident.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，薄熙来事件发生时任中共中央政治局常委。据报道，他与薄熙来关系密切，曾抵制中央免去薄熙来职务的决定，后因严重违纪违法被查处。
description.en: A Chinese politician who was a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo when the Bo Xilai incident occurred. He reportedly had close ties to Bo Xilai, resisted the central government's decision to remove Bo from his posts, and was later investigated for serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，薄熙来事件发生时任中共中央总书记。他与其他政治局常委一同支持了免除薄熙来职务的决定。
description.en: A Chinese politician who was the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee when the Bo Xilai incident occurred. He, along with other Politburo Standing Committee members, supported the decision to remove Bo Xilai from his positions.

description.zh-cn: 英国商人，在重庆被谷开来谋杀，其死亡案件成为薄熙来事件的关键导火索之一。
description.en: A British businessman murdered by Gu Kailai in Chongqing. His death became a key trigger for the Bo Xilai case.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾接替张德江担任重庆市委书记。后因严重违纪被查处，其中一项问题是清除“薄、王”遗毒不彻底。
description.en: A Chinese politician who succeeded Zhang Dejiang as Chongqing Party Secretary. He was later investigated for serious violations of discipline, one of the issues being the incomplete elimination of the 'pernicious influence' of Bo Xilai and Wang Lijun.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来之兄。在薄熙来事件后辞去了在中国光大集团的职务。
description.en: Bo Xilai's elder brother. He resigned from his position at China Everbright Group after the Bo Xilai incident.

nodes.id: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党重庆市委员会
en: Chongqing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市的地方组织。薄熙来曾担任其书记职务。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Chongqing. Bo Xilai once served as its secretary.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一，由中央委员会全体会议选举产生。薄熙来曾是其委员之一，后被停止职务并开除党籍。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China, elected by the plenary session of the Central Committee. Bo Xilai was one of its members before being suspended and expelled from the party.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在薄熙来被免职后接任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who took over as Party Secretary of Chongqing after Bo Xilai's dismissal.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来与谷开来之子。
description.en: The son of Bo Xilai and Gu Kailai.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党前中央委员会总书记。据报道，他支持了免除薄熙来职务的决定。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. He reportedly supported the decision to remove Bo Xilai from his posts.

description.zh-cn: 王立军事件的发生地，王立军曾进入该领事馆滞留。
description.en: The location of the Wang Lijun incident, where Wang Lijun entered and stayed.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第十四集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第十四集团军
en: 14th Group Army of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一个集团军，由薄一波创建。薄熙来在王立军事件后曾前往该部队参观。
description.en: A group army of the People's Liberation Army, founded by Bo Yibo. Bo Xilai visited this unit after the Wang Lijun incident.

en: Singing red songs and cracking down on gangs

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来在重庆主政期间发起的政治运动，包括宣扬红色文化和严厉打击有组织犯罪。该运动引发了广泛争议。
description.en: A political movement initiated by Bo Xilai during his tenure in Chongqing, which included promoting red culture and severely cracking down on organized crime. The movement sparked widespread controversy.

nodes.id: 中央巡视工作领导小组

zh-cn: 中央巡视工作领导小组
en: Central Leading Group for Inspection Work

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的巡视工作领导机构。其巡视组曾批评重庆清除“薄、王”遗毒不够彻底，这成为孙政才下台的原因之一。
description.en: The leading body for inspection work of the Communist Party of China. Its inspection team criticized Chongqing for not thoroughly eliminating the 'pernicious influence' of Bo and Wang, which became one of the reasons for Sun Zhengcai's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 王立军事件是薄熙来案的直接导火索，诱发了薄熙来被中共中央免职调查。
description.en: The Wang Lijun incident was the direct trigger for the Bo Xilai case, leading to Bo's dismissal and investigation by the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 海伍德死亡案的复查揭示了谷开来的罪行，成为薄熙来案的重要背景和调查内容之一。
description.en: The re-investigation of the Neil Heywood death case revealed Gu Kailai's crime, becoming an important background and part of the investigation in the Bo Xilai case.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来是中共元老薄一波的儿子。
description.en: Bo Xilai is the son of CPC elder Bo Yibo.

description.zh-cn: 谷开来是薄熙来的妻子。
description.en: Gu Kailai is Bo Xilai's wife.

description.zh-cn: 薄瓜瓜是薄熙来的儿子。
description.en: Bo Guagua is Bo Xilai's son.

description.zh-cn: 薄瓜瓜是谷开来的儿子。
description.en: Bo Guagua is Gu Kailai's son.

description.zh-cn: 王立军曾是薄熙来的亲信，在薄熙来主政重庆期间担任公安局长等职。
description.en: Wang Lijun was a confidant of Bo Xilai, serving as Public Security Bureau Chief and other roles during Bo's tenure in Chongqing.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 2012年3月15日，中共中央决定薄熙来不再兼任重庆市委书记等职务，并于4月10日停止其担任的中央委员和政治局委员职务。
description.en: On March 15, 2012, the CPC Central Committee decided that Bo Xilai would no longer serve as Chongqing Party Secretary and other positions, and on April 10, suspended him from his roles as a Central Committee member and Politburo member.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共中央纪委对薄熙来涉嫌严重违纪问题进行立案调查。
description.en: The CCDI launched an investigation into Bo Xilai for suspected serious violations of discipline.

description.zh-cn: 济南市人民检察院就薄熙来涉嫌受贿、贪污、滥用职权一案向济南市中级人民法院提起公诉。
description.en: The Jinan People's Procuratorate filed a public prosecution against Bo Xilai for bribery, embezzlement, and abuse of power at the Jinan Intermediate People's Court.

description.zh-cn: 济南市中级人民法院一审判决薄熙来无期徒刑。
description.en: The Jinan Intermediate People's Court sentenced Bo Xilai to life imprisonment in the first-instance trial.

description.zh-cn: 时任总理温家宝在记者会上严厉批评重庆市委，要求其就王立军事件反思，并支持免除薄熙来职务的决定。
description.en: Then-Premier Wen Jiabao severely criticized the Chongqing Municipal Party Committee at a press conference, demanding reflection on the Wang Lijun incident, and supported the decision to remove Bo Xilai from his posts.

description.zh-cn: 周永康与薄熙来关系密切，据报道他曾抵制中央免去薄熙来职务的决定，并向薄泄露机密信息。
description.en: Zhou Yongkang had close ties to Bo Xilai; he reportedly resisted the central government's decision to remove Bo and leaked confidential information to him.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记胡锦涛支持免除薄熙来职务的决定。
description.en: Then-General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee Hu Jintao supported the decision to remove Bo Xilai from his posts.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记江泽民支持免除薄熙来职务的决定，并称薄的问题已突破了人类文明的底线。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee Jiang Zemin supported the decision to remove Bo Xilai from his posts, stating that Bo's issues had broken the bottom line of human civilization.

description.zh-cn: 谷开来因与尼尔·海伍德有经济利益矛盾，涉嫌故意杀人，最终被判处死缓。
description.en: Gu Kailai was suspected of intentional homicide in the death of Neil Heywood due to economic conflicts and was eventually sentenced to a suspended death penalty.

description.zh-cn: 2012年2月2日，中共重庆市委决定免去王立军的市公安局局长、党委书记职务，这一举动被认为是王立军出走美国领事馆的直接原因。
description.en: On February 2, 2012, the Chongqing Municipal Party Committee decided to remove Wang Lijun from his positions as Public Security Bureau Chief and Party Secretary, an act considered the direct cause of Wang's flight to the U.S. consulate.

description.zh-cn: 张德江接替薄熙来出任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: Zhang Dejiang succeeded Bo Xilai as the Party Secretary of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 受薄熙来案影响，其兄薄熙永（化名李学明）于2012年4月25日辞去中国光大集团执行董事兼副总经理职务。
description.en: Affected by the Bo Xilai case, his elder brother Bo Xiyong (alias Li Xueming) resigned from his positions as Executive Director and Deputy General Manager of China Everbright Group on April 25, 2012.

description.zh-cn: 薄熙永是薄熙来的兄长。
description.en: Bo Xiyong is Bo Xilai's elder brother.

description.zh-cn: 中央巡视组批评孙政才主政的重庆清除“薄、王”遗毒不够彻底，这成为孙政才后来被查处的原因之一。
description.en: The Central Inspection Group criticized Chongqing under Sun Zhengcai's leadership for inadequately eliminating the 'pernicious influence' of Bo and Wang, which became one of the reasons for Sun's subsequent investigation.

relationships.source: 中央巡视工作领导小组

description.zh-cn: 中央巡视组对重庆进行“回头看”后，对孙政才领导的市委提出严厉批评，为其后来被查处埋下伏笔。
description.en: After conducting a 'look back' inspection in Chongqing, the Central Inspection Group severely criticized the municipal party committee led by Sun Zhengcai, foreshadowing his eventual investigation.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第十四集团军

description.zh-cn: 薄一波是第十四集团军的创建者之一。
description.en: Bo Yibo was one of the founders of the 14th Group Army.

description.zh-cn: 王立军于2012年2月6日进入美国驻成都总领事馆并滞留一天，引爆了王立军事件。
description.en: Wang Lijun entered the U.S. Consulate General in Chengdu on February 6, 2012, and stayed for one day, triggering the Wang Lijun incident.

relationships.target: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来曾任中共重庆市委书记等职务，直至2012年3月15日被免职。
description.en: Bo Xilai served as Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee and other positions until he was removed from office on March 15, 2012.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 薄熙来曾任中共中央政治局委员，直至2012年4月10日被停止职务。
description.en: Bo Xilai served as a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee until he was suspended from the position on April 10, 2012.
